entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:22 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then flurries or blizzard. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
